mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kfashion_image ( work_no, img_data, created_datetime, updated_datetime ) VALUES ( #{workNo}, #{imgData}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT kfashion_image.work_no, SUBSTRING_INDEX(kfashion_work.work_name,'.',1) work_name, CONCAT('/api/v1/kfashion/img/getByteImage?workNo=',kfashion_work.no) file_name, kfashion_work.created_datetime, kfashion_work_history.created_id FROM kfashion_image LEFT JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no RIGHT JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no WHERE kfashion_work.work_state = 1 ORDER BY kfashion_image.work_no DESC

SELECT DISTINCT kfashion_image.work_no, SUBSTRING_INDEX(kfashion_work.work_name,'.',1) work_name, CONCAT('/api/v1/kfashion/img/getByteImage?workNo=',kfashion_work.no) file_name, kfashion_work.created_datetime, kfashion_work_history.created_id, kfashion_comment.comment, IF(kfashion_comment.complete = 'Y', 'Y' , 'N') AS complete FROM kfashion_image INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no INNER JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no LEFT OUTER JOIN kfashion_comment ON(kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_comment.work_no AND kfashion_comment.work_step =3) WHERE kfashion_work_history.created_id = #{createdId} AND kfashion_work_history.work_step = 2 AND kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN(SELECT kfashion_work_history.work_no FROM kfashion_work_history WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 3 AND kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN (SELECT kfashion_comment.work_no FROM kfashion_comment WHERE kfashion_comment.work_step = 3 AND kfashion_comment.complete NOT IN ('Y'))) HAVING complete = 'N' ORDER BY kfashion_comment.comment DESC

SELECT DISTINCT kfashion_image.work_no, SUBSTRING_INDEX(kfashion_work.work_name,'.',1) work_name, CONCAT('/api/v1/kfashion/img/getByteImage?workNo=',kfashion_work.no) file_name, kfashion_work.created_datetime, kfashion_work_history.created_id, kfashion_comment.comment, IF(kfashion_comment.complete = 'Y', 'Y' , 'N') AS complete FROM kfashion_image INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no INNER JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no LEFT OUTER JOIN kfashion_comment ON(kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_comment.work_no AND kfashion_comment.work_step =4) WHERE kfashion_work_history.created_id = #{createdId} AND kfashion_work_history.work_step = 3 AND kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN(SELECT kfashion_work_history.work_no FROM kfashion_work_history WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 4 AND kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN (SELECT kfashion_comment.work_no FROM kfashion_comment WHERE kfashion_comment.work_step = 4 AND kfashion_comment.complete NOT IN ('Y'))) HAVING complete = 'N' ORDER BY kfashion_comment.comment DESC

SELECT DISTINCT kfashion_image.work_no, SUBSTRING_INDEX(kfashion_work.work_name,'.',1) work_name, CONCAT('/api/v1/kfashion/img/getByteImage?workNo=',kfashion_work.no) file_name, kfashion_work.created_datetime, kfashion_work_history.created_id FROM kfashion_image INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no INNER JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no WHERE kfashion_work_history.created_id = #{createdId} AND kfashion_work_history.work_step = 5 AND kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN(SELECT kfashion_work_history.work_no FROM kfashion_work_history WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 6) ORDER BY kfashion_image.work_no DESC

SELECT DISTINCT kfashion_image.work_no, SUBSTRING_INDEX(kfashion_work.work_name,'.',1) work_name, CONCAT('/api/v1/kfashion/img/getByteImage?workNo=',kfashion_work.no) file_name, kfashion_work_history.created_datetime, (select kfashion_work_history.created_id from kfashion_work_history where kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no and kfashion_work_history.work_step = 6) as created_id FROM kfashion_image INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no INNER JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 6 AND kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN(SELECT kfashion_work_history.work_no FROM kfashion_work_history WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 8) GROUP BY kfashion_image.work_no

SELECT DISTINCT kfashion_image.work_no, SUBSTRING_INDEX(kfashion_work.work_name,'.',1) work_name, CONCAT('/api/v1/kfashion/img/getByteImage?workNo=',kfashion_work.no) file_name, kfashion_work_history.created_datetime FROM kfashion_image INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no INNER JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no LEFT JOIN kfashion_comment ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_comment.work_no WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 4 AND kfashion_image.work_no NOT IN (SELECT work_no FROM kfashion_comment WHERE complete = 'N') AND kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN(SELECT kfashion_work_history.work_no FROM kfashion_work_history WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 7) ORDER BY kfashion_image.work_no

SELECT DISTINCT kfashion_image.work_no, SUBSTRING_INDEX(kfashion_work.work_name,'.',1) work_name, CONCAT('/api/v1/kfashion/img/getByteImage?workNo=',kfashion_work.no) file_name, kfashion_work_history.created_id, kfashion_work_history.updated_datetime FROM kfashion_image INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no INNER JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 6 And kfashion_work_history.created_id = #{created_Id} ORDER BY kfashion_work_history.updated_datetime DESC LIMIT 5
